118574.「わーん！ <%sM_OWNER><%sM_SAMA>！ ずるい～！\n どうし:
WOW! <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER>! That's not fair~! Why did you say it first~! It's me, me, me! For a long time now, there have been days when
I couldn't sleep because I was wondering when I was going to tell you! But I'm so happy. Now we'll be together forever! What's that? Could
it be... did you tell me you love me? I'm so embarrassed. Please forget it!

118575.「は～い！ なんでしょう <%sM_OWNER><%sM_SAMA>！\n <%:
Ha~yes! What is <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER>? I will
be very happy if <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER> can
call me by my name!

118576.「うわーい！ すっごく うれしいです～！\n ボクだって <%sM_OWNER>:
Wow! I'm so happy! I love <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER> too! Please let me be with you forever and ever! I will support
<%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER> a lot! I will continue to evolve more and more, so please watch by my side all the time~!

118578.「は～い！ なんでしょう <%sM_OWNER><%sM_SAMA>！\n <%:

118579.「うわーい！ すっごく うれしいです～！\n 私だって <%sM_OWNER><:

118580.「おおー。愛してるって すごいなー！\n <%sM_OWNER> オイラのこと:
Oh wow. I love you so much! <%sM_OWNER> You love me, don't you? Oh, I'm in trouble! I'm so happy... I love <%sM_OWNER>, too. I love
<%sM_OWNER> too, and I always will, so please know that. I'll always love <%sM_OWNER>. I thought about it... I didn't ask him what he
loves..! Oh no! I've got it all wrong!

118581.「お！ 呼んだかー？ どうしたー？\n オイラは いつでも 準備ＯＫなんだぞー。:
Oh! You wanted to see me? I'm always ready for
you. I'm always ready.

118582.「おお？ 好き？ スキあり！ なんてなー！\n すんげー うれしいなー。オイラも:
Oh? You like it? Suki! What a surprise! I'm soooo happy! I and <%sM_OWNER> will always be invincible no matter what happens. Let's have
fun every day from now on!

118583.「わおー。愛してるって すごいねー！\n <%sM_OWNER> 私のこと 大好:
Wow. That's great that you love me! <%sM_OWNER> You love me, don't you? I'm in trouble. I'm so happy... I love <%sM_OWNER>,
too. I love <%sM_OWNER> too, and I always will, so please know that. I'll always love you, so just know that. I haven't asked you

118584.「お！ 呼んだー？ どうしたのー？\n 私は いつでも 準備ＯＫなのよー。\n:
Oh! You called? What's wrong? I'm always
ready. Just tell me what you want.

118585.「ひゃー！ 好き？ スキあり！ なんちゃって！\n すっごく うれしいなー。私も:
Hyah! Do you like it? Suki ni! Just kidding! I'm so happy! Me too! This is what I call "mutual love"! If it's me and <%sM_OWNER>, no
matter what happens, we'll always be invincible! Let's have fun every day from now on!

118586.「……はっ！ すみません 固まっておりました。\n ああ どうしたらいいのでしょ:
...Ha! I'm sorry. I was frozen. Oh, what should I do? I can't do this! I'm the one who's supposed to serve you! But I've always
admired you too! I've always wished that I had been. I will follow <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER> for the rest of my life! ...I guess I didn't
really listen to what I said I love you for...! I'm sorry, please forget it!

118587.「はい！ お呼びですか <%sM_OWNER><%sM_SAMA>！\n <%s:
Yes, I'm here! You wanted to see me, <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER>? <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER>, we are more than happy to be of service to
you, so please feel free to tell us anything!

118588.「えっ！ い 今なんておっしゃったのですか！\n 私の聞きまちがえでしょうか……:
What? What did you just say? Did I mishear you... you said you like... Oh, no, you weren't talking about me... Oh, what am I
saying... it's okay! It's okay! Please listen to me. I adore <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER>!

118589.「お前……軽々しく 愛してるとか 言うなよ。\n 外でもそれ やってるんじゃない:
You... don't say things like "I love you" so casually. You're not doing that outside the office, are you? Don't use that word outside
of my presence.

118590.「ん？ どうした <%sM_OWNER>？\n さみしくなったんなら いつでも話:
Hmm? What's up <%sM_OWNER>? If you get lonely,
you can talk to me anytime. I'll listen to you
when I'm not busy.

118591.「ん？ 今 好きって言ったか？\n 何を好きって言ったつもりだか……\n 人の気:
Hmm? Did you just say you like him? I don't know what you thought you were saying, but... you're a carefree guy who doesn't know what's
going on with people. Just think he's talking to himself and let it slide. I still like you a lot.

118592.「愛してる……か。\n なかなか 普段 使わない言葉だよね。\n<br>\n「い:
I love you.... It's a word I don't usually use. No, it's not! I couldn't find the right words. This is not what I wanted to say! I'm
sorry for being so clumsy. You throw the ball straight at me so much... I think you're special, too. I mean... Hm? I'm sorry. You
don't mean you love me, do you? Oh, my God, don't startle me!

118593.「ん？ なんだい <%sM_OWNER>？\n 君が 僕を名前で呼ぶなんて 珍し:
Hmm? What is it, <%sM_OWNER>? It's rare that
you call me by my name. I'm glad because I
usually call you by your first name.

118594.「どうしたんだい？ 急に びっくりしたよ。\n ごめん 茶化したいわけじゃないん:
What's the matter? You startled me all of a sudden. I'm sorry. I don't mean to make fun of you. Well, I like you too. Well... It's hard
to express in words. I'll always be by your side from now on, so I hope you believe me from my actions.

118595.「愛してる……ね。\n なかなか 普段 使わない言葉よね。\n<br>\n「うう:
I love you...right? It's a word you don't often use. No, it's not that! The words didn't come out right. This is not what I wanted to
say! I'm sorry for being so clumsy. You throw the ball so hard, I think you're special too. I mean... Oh? I'm sorry. I thought you said
you loved me. Oh, my God! You scared me!

118596.「あら？ どうしたの <%sM_OWNER>？\n あなたが 私の名前を呼ぶって:
Oh? What's the matter, <%sM_OWNER>? It's refreshing to hear you call me by my name. I'm glad because I'm usually the one who calls you
that.

118597.「どうしたの？ 急に びっくりしたわ。\n ごめん 茶化したいわけじゃないの。\:
What's wrong? You startled me. I'm sorry. I didn't mean to make fun of you. You're right. I like you too. Hmm. It's hard to tell you in
